extendedInfo.description: It can be expensive to do science experiments. Physics Gizmo allows you to collect science data at school, home, or even in space using only your Android phone.1) Turn on Bluetooth to enable all sensors2) Select your sensor3) Give your data a name or leave it with the time and date.4) Set the timer.5) Click start to collect data.5) Upload your data to analyze later.More details can be found at http://www.brokenairplane.com/2011/10/android-education-science-physicsgizmo.htmlMy goal is for this app to enable more students around the world to do science!

reviews.title: Fun app, tons of possibilities
reviews.comment: Being able to record accelerometer data is just the start. This app has lots of possibilities for a science educator.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: The accelerometer shows data, but it doesn\'t make sense. None of the other modes show anything. So unless I\'m missing something important, it doesn\'t work - at least on the Incredible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One great educational software
reviews.comment: Very cool I can\'t wait to use this in some lessons next school year.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just to have.
reviews.comment: One day I will be somewhere where strapping my phone to something and collecting data would be handy. This app is for that day. Works well.
reviews.author: A Google User
